verses.text: And it came to pass, when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* were \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w* on the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that the \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w* had \w invaded|strong="H6584"\w* the \w south|strong="H5045"\w*, and \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, and \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, and \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* it with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*;

And had taken the \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*, that \add were\add* therein: they \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* not \w any|strong="H0376"\w*, either \w great|strong="H1419"\w* or \w small|strong="H6996"\w*, but carried \add them\add* \w away|strong="H5090"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* on their \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

¶ So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and, behold, \add it was\add* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*; and their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*, and their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, and their \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, were taken \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*.

Then \w David|strong="H1732"\w* and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*, until they had no more \w power|strong="H3581"\w* to \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*.

And \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* were taken \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*, \w Ahinoam|strong="H0293"\w* the \w Jezreelitess|strong="H3159"\w*, and \w Abigail|strong="H0026"\w* the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Nabal|strong="H5037"\w* the \w Carmelite|strong="H3761"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* was \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w* \w distressed|strong="H3334"\w*; for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* of \w stoning|strong="H5619"\w* him, because the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* was \w grieved|strong="H4843"\w*, every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* for his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and for his \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: but \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w encouraged|strong="H2388"\w* himself in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.\f + \fr 30.6 \ft grieved: Heb. bitter\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w Ahimelech’s|strong="H0288"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, I pray thee, bring me \w hither|strong="H5066"\w* the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*. And \w Abiathar|strong="H0054"\w* \w brought|strong="H5066"\w* thither the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w enquired|strong="H7592"\w* at the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall I \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* this \w troop|strong="H1416"\w*? shall I \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* them? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* him, \w Pursue|strong="H7291"\w*: for thou shalt \w surely|strong="H5381"\w* \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* \add them\add*, and without \w fail|strong="H5337"\w* \w recover|strong="H5337"\w* \add all\add*.

So \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, he and the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* that \add were\add* with him, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Besor|strong="H1308"\w*, where those that were left \w behind|strong="H3498"\w* \w stayed|strong="H5975"\w*.

But \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w*, he and \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*: for two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* abode \w behind|strong="H5975"\w*, which were so \w faint|strong="H6296"\w* that they could not go \w over|strong="H5674"\w* the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Besor|strong="H1308"\w*.

¶ And they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* an \w Egyptian|strong="H0376"\w* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and \w brought|strong="H3947"\w* him to \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, and he did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w*; and they made him \w drink|strong="H8248"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*;

And they \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* him a \w piece|strong="H6400"\w* of a \w cake|strong="H1690"\w* of figs, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* clusters of \w raisins|strong="H6778"\w*: and when he had \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w*, his \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* came \w again|strong="H7725"\w* to him: for he had \w eaten|strong="H0398"\w* no \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, nor \w drunk|strong="H8354"\w* \add any\add* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w nights|strong="H3915"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, To whom \add belongest\add* thou? and whence \add art\add* thou? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* a young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4713"\w*, \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* to an \w Amalekite|strong="H0376"\w*; and my \w master|strong="H0113"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* me, because \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* agone I fell \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*.

We made an \w invasion|strong="H6584"\w* \add upon\add* the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* of the \w Cherethites|strong="H3774"\w*, and upon \add the coast\add* which \add belongeth\add* to \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and upon the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* of \w Caleb|strong="H3612"\w*; and we \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w* with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to him, Canst thou bring me \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to this \w company|strong="H1416"\w*? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Swear|strong="H7650"\w* unto me by \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that thou wilt neither \w kill|strong="H4191"\w* me, \w nor|strong="H0518"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5462"\w* me into the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of my \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, and I will bring thee \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to this \w company|strong="H1416"\w*.

¶ And when he had brought him \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, behold, \add they were\add* spread \w abroad|strong="H5203"\w* upon \w all|strong="H6440"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w eating|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drinking|strong="H8354"\w*, and \w dancing|strong="H2287"\w*, because of all the \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* that they had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, and out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* them from the \w twilight|strong="H5399"\w* even unto the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* of the next \w day|strong="H4283"\w*: and there \w escaped|strong="H4422"\w* not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* of them, save \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, which \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* upon \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*.\f + \fr 30.17 \ft the next…: Heb. their morrow\f*

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w recovered|strong="H5337"\w* all that the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* had carried \w away|strong="H3947"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w rescued|strong="H5337"\w* his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wives|strong="H0802"\w*.

And there was nothing \w lacking|strong="H5737"\w* to them, \w neither|strong="H4480"\w* \w small|strong="H6996"\w* nor \w great|strong="H1419"\w*, neither \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* nor \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, neither \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*, nor any \add thing\add* that they had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* to them: \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w recovered|strong="H7725"\w* all.

And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* all the \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w* and the \w herds|strong="H1241"\w*, \add which\add* they \w drave|strong="H5090"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w those|strong="H1931"\w* \add other\add* \w cattle|strong="H4735"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* \w David’s|strong="H1732"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to the two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, which were so \w faint|strong="H6296"\w* that they could not \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, whom they had made also to \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* at the \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w Besor|strong="H1308"\w*: and they went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \add were\add* with him: and when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* came \w near|strong="H5066"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, he \w saluted|strong="H7592"\w* them.\f + \fr 30.21 \ft saluted…: or, asked them how they did\f*

Then \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* all the \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* and \add men\add* of \w Belial|strong="H1100"\w*, of \w those|strong="H0582"\w* that \w went|strong="H1980"\w* with \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Because they \w went|strong="H1980"\w* not with us, we will not \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them \add ought\add* of the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* that we have \w recovered|strong="H5337"\w*, save to every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* and his \w children|strong="H1121"\w*, that they may lead \add them\add* \w away|strong="H5090"\w*, and \w depart|strong="H3212"\w*.\f + \fr 30.22 \ft those: Heb. men\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, Ye shall not do \w so|strong="H6213"\w*, my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, with that which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* us, who hath \w preserved|strong="H8104"\w* us, and \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* the \w company|strong="H1416"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* against us into our \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

For who will \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto you in this \w matter|strong="H1697"\w*? but as his \w part|strong="H2506"\w* \add is\add* that goeth \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, so \add shall\add* his \w part|strong="H2506"\w* \add be\add* that \w tarrieth|strong="H3427"\w* by the \w stuff|strong="H3627"\w*: they shall \w part|strong="H2505"\w* \w alike|strong="H3162"\w*.

And it was \add so\add* from that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w forward|strong="H4605"\w*, that he \w made|strong="H7760"\w* it a \w statute|strong="H2706"\w* and an \w ordinance|strong="H4941"\w* for \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 30.25 \ft forward: Heb. and forward\f*

¶ And when \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Ziklag|strong="H6860"\w*, he \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* of the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* unto the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add even\add* to his \w friends|strong="H7453"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold a \w present|strong="H1293"\w* for you of the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* of the \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*;\f + \fr 30.26 \ft present: Heb. blessing\f*

To \add  \+w them|strong="H0834"\+w*\add* which \add were\add* in \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w Ramoth|strong="H7418"\w*, and to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in \w Jattir|strong="H3492"\w*,

And to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in \w Aroer|strong="H6177"\w*, and to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in \w Siphmoth|strong="H8224"\w*, and to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in \w Eshtemoa|strong="H0851"\w*,

And to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in \w Rachal|strong="H7403"\w*, and to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Jerahmeelites|strong="H3397"\w*, and to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* of the \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w*,

And to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in \w Hormah|strong="H2767"\w*, and to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in \w Chor-ashan|strong="H3565"\w*, and to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in \w Athach|strong="H6269"\w*,

And to \add them\add* which \add were\add* in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and to all the \w places|strong="H4725"\w* where \w David|strong="H1732"\w* himself and his \w men|strong="H0582"\w* were wont to \w haunt|strong="H1980"\w*.
